Name: USS Wasp
Namesake: In naming CV-18 "Wasp", the Navy honors eight previous ships, dating to the American Revolution, which have borne this illustrious name.
Reclassified:
CV to CVA 1 October 1952
CVA to CVS 1 November 1956
see SCB-27 and SCB-125 for conversion information
Displacement:
27,100 long tons (27,500 t) (standard)
36,380 long tons (36,960 t) (full load)
Armament:
4 × twin, 4 × single 5 in (127 mm) DP guns
8 × quadruple 40 mm (1.6 in) AA guns
46 × single 20 mm (0.8 in) AA guns
Armor:
Waterline belt: 2.5–4 in (64–102 mm)
Deck: 1.5 in (38 mm)
Hangar deck: 2.5 in (64 mm)
Bulkheads: 4 in (102 mm)
